programme.title: Live ATP Tennis
programme.desc: The German Open. Coverage of the second day of the ATP World Tour 500 series clay court tournament at the Am Rothenbaum in Hamburg. Leonardo Mayer claimed last year's title after beating Florian Mayer in three sets in the final, despite only gaining entry to the event as a `lucky loser'. His run began in spectacular fashion, as he defeated number one seed Albert Ramos Vinolas in the opening round.

programme.title: Live World Matchplay Darts
programme.desc: Coverage of day four from the Winter Gardens in Blackpool, featuring the matches from the second round. programme.title: Live Betfred Super League
programme.desc: St Helens v Warrington Wolves (Kick-off 7.45pm). Coverage of the match from the 23rd round of fixtures, taking place at Totally Wicked Stadium. Following this round of matches the league will split into the Super 8s and The Qualifiers, and both of these sides are already guaranteed of a place in the top eight. These teams have only faced each other once this season, and St Helens triumphed 30-12 on that occasion.(n)

programme.desc: Swindon face Leicester in the SGB Premiership at the Abbey Stadium. The Robins hope to bounce back after tasting defeat for the first time on home soil this season last time out.(n)

programme.desc: Go inside the lives and training camps of Eddie Alvarez and Dustin Poirier as they prepare to clash for the second time in the Octagon at the Scotiabank Saddledome in Alberta.(n)

programme.title: UFC Main Event
programme.desc: A look back at UFC 173 from May 2014 as T.J. Dillashaw and Renan Barao went head-to-head in a brutal bantamweight battle in Las Vegas.(n)

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: We revisit the thrilling 2008/09 Premier League clash between Stoke and Aston Villa at the Britannia. This was the Potters' first home match in the English top-flight for 23 years.(n)

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: We revisit the 2008/09 Premier League clash between Tottenham and Hull at White Hart Lane. With pressure increasing on manager Juande Ramos, the hosts desperately needed a win.(n)

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: We revisit the pulsating 2008/09 Premier League clash between London rivals Fulham and Chelsea at Craven Cottage. Fulham looked to extend their unbeaten league run to nine matches.(n)

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Take a look back at the nine MotoGP races of the 2018 season so far. Marc Marquez leads the way in the championship going into the summer break.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2011/12 UEFA Champions League last 16 second leg between Chelsea and Napoli at Stamford Bridge. The Blues had sacked Andre Villas-Boas after a 3-1 first leg defeat.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2011/12 UEFA Champions League semi-final second leg between Real Madrid and Bayern Munich at the Bernabeu. Mario Gomez's goal gave Bayern a 2-1 first leg victory.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2011/12 UEFA Champions League semi-final second leg between Barcelona and Chelsea at the Nou Camp. Didier Drogba's goal gave the Blues a 1-0 first leg advantage.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2013/14 UEFA Champions League group stage tie between Galatasaray and Real Madrid in Istanbul. It would end up being Galatasaray's heaviest home defeat in Europe.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2013/14 UEFA Champions League semi-final second leg between Bayern Munich and Real Madrid at the Allianz Arena. Karim Benzema had given Madrid a 1-0 first leg win.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the entertaining 2014/15 UEFA Champions League group stage tie between Manchester City and Bayern Munich at the Etihad. City were in need of a win in order to progress.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2014/15 UEFA Champions League last 16 first leg between Manchester City and Barcelona at the Etihad. Luis Suarez marked his first return to England with two goals.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2014/15 UEFA Champions League quarter-final first leg between PSG and Barcelona at the Parc des Princes. PSG had been unbeaten at home in Europe for nine years.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2014/15 UEFA Champions League quarter-final second leg between Bayern Munich and Porto at the Allianz Arena. Bayern suffered a shock 3-1 defeat in the first leg.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2014/15 UEFA Champions League semi-final first leg between Barcelona and Bayern Munich, Josep Guardiola's first match at the Nou Camp since leaving the club.(n)

Kitajska liga: Hebei - Jiangsu
programme.desc: V najštevilčnejši državi na planetu iz leta v letu več vlagajo v nogomet. V Kitajski prvi ligi tako najdemo številna ugledna imena, kot so Jackson Martinez, Teixiera, Ramires, Gervinho, Ezequiel Lavezzi in ostali, ki dvigujejo raven kakovosti kitajskega nogometa. V leta 2004 ustanovljeni Super ligi se meri 16 moštev, aktualni prvaki prihajajo iz vrste Guangzhou Evergrande, ki so s sedmimi naslovi hkrati tudi najuspešnejše moštvo.(n)

programme.title: Danska liga: Brondby - Vejle
programme.desc: Danska Superliga je najvišje kotirano ligaško nogometno tekmovanje na Danskem. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1991 pod okriljem Danske nogometne zveze. Je naslednica t.i. Danske prve lige. V njej nastopa 12 klubov. Najuspešnejši klub je FC Copenhagen, med zelo uspešne danske klube spadajo tudi Odense BK, AaB Aalborg in Brondby IF, naslov brani Midtjylland, ki je osvojil drugi naslov v klubski zgodovini.

programme.title: Danska liga: Brondby - Vejle

programme.title: Open Court
programme.desc: A star-studded cast takes us inside the best and worst moments of their career, including Isiah Thomas hitting a game-winning shot the same day his mother accepts his diploma at Indiana; Charles Barkley scoring 44 points in a deciding Game 7; and Shaquille O'Neal scoring a career high 61 points on his birthday. Dennis Scott, Kevin McHale and host Ernie Johnson also appear. (cc).(c)

programme.desc: From 1988: Los Angeles Lakers at Utah in a Christmas Day game. Karl Malone lifted the Jazz over Magic Johnson and L.A. (cc).

programme.desc: From 1997: Utah at Houston in Game 6 of the Western Conference finals. The Jazz knocked off Houston 103-100 to clinch the series. John Stockton led Utah with 25 points. (cc).(c)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 1997: Chicago Bulls at Utah Jazz
programme.desc: From 1997: Chicago at Utah in Game 3 of the NBA Finals. Karl Malone and John Stockton went to work on digging the Jazz out of a 2-0 hole as the series shifted to Salt Lake City. (cc).(c)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 1998: Utah Jazz at Chicago Bulls
programme.desc: Utah at Chicago in Game 5 of the 1998 Finals. The Jazz postponed the Bulls' sixth title in eight years with an 83-81 win at the United Center. Karl Malone scored 39 points to lead Utah. (cc).

programme.title: Road to the Roses *
programme.desc: Kirby Smart's Bulldogs head to Pasadena to spend the week preparing for the Rose Bowl CFP semifinal, a thrilling 54-48 double-overtime win over Oklahoma. We'll see them get ready for the game at practice, as well as seeing the sights in California. (cc).

programme.title: College Football Playoff Semifinal: Rose Bowl: Georgia vs. Oklahoma
programme.desc: Georgia (12-1) vs. Oklahoma (12-1). From the Rose Bowl in Pasadena, Cal. Heisman Trophy winner Baker Mayfield (41 TDs, 5 INTs) QBs the Sooners under 34-year-old head coach Lincoln Riley, while Georgia leans on senior RBs Nick Chubb and Sony Michel. This is the teams' first meeting and second Rose Bowl appearance for each, with the Bulldogs winning after the 1942 season and OU romping on New Year's Day 2003. (cc).

programme.desc: Oklahoma at Alabama in the Big 12/SEC Challenge. From Coleman Coliseum. Oklahoma is led by freshman Trae Young, who leads the country in scoring (30.3 ppg) and assists (9.6 apg). They'll take on Alabama and SEC top-5 scorer Collin Sexton (18.5 ppg). (cc).

programme.title: College Football Playoff Semifinal: Sugar Bowl: Alabama vs. Clemson
programme.desc: Alabama (11-1) vs. Clemson (12-1). From Mercedes-Benz Superdome in New Orleans. Coaches Nick Saban and Dabo Swinney meet again after splitting the last two CFP title games. Tackles Raekwon Davis and Christian Wilkins anchor defenses that rank 1-2 in ppg. At QB, Tide sophomore Jalen Hurts has thrown one INT all season and looks to improve on his 13-for-31 night vs. Clemson last year. Tigers junior Kelly Bryant (24 total TDs) operates behind three first-team All-ACC linemen. (cc).

programme.title: College Football Playoff National Championship: Alabama vs. Georgia
programme.desc: Alabama vs. Georgia in the CFP National Championship. From Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta. 'Bama coach Nick Saban can equal Bear Bryant's record six national titles, while true freshman QB Jake Fromm leads Georgia's bid for its first title in 37 years. Dawgs coach Kirby Smart hopes to spoil Saban's 11-0 mark in games against his former assistants. Both teams already have wins at this new venue this season. (cc).

programme.title: Backcountry Hunters TV
programme.desc: Hal Gahm and Todd McKinney team up with Joey Burns to hunt mule deer on one of the most unbelievable places in Colorado.(n)

programme.title: Elk Camp
programme.desc: Steve Chappell guides long time client Junior Philpot on an elk hunt on their southwest Colorado private lands.(n)

programme.title: Wildlifers
programme.desc: Texas country music artist Kevin Fowler joins the WildLifers on a hunt in New Mexico during elk season. Dan Braman arrives to camp just a couple days early and sets out to fill his tag.(n)

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: Mike Schoby initiates his young nephew into the world of the hunter as they pursue a big whitetail buck on Nebraska's windy plains.(n)

programme.title: Whitetail Properties
programme.desc: It happens again in south central Kansas. Two giants hit the dirt during the early muzzleloader season. Further proving that Kansas holds and grows great whitetails. The challenge is, as always, the wicked western weather.(n)

programme.title: Huntin' the Backwoods *
programme.desc: Dan and Troy return to Newfoundland Adventures for another spring bear hunt with Todd and Laura Wiseman. Troy is shocked as he encounters not one, but two three-legged bears on the island and Dan tags another dandy Newfoundland bear.(n)

programme.title: North American Whitetail Television
programme.desc: Stan Potts bowhunts Illinois and doubles down in Montana with his rifle; Dr. Deer considers whether missing a buck will ruin a hunting spot; and we'll talk real-world archery practice.(n)

programme.title: Outback Outdoors
programme.desc: Six-year-old Levi Ray gives us a sneak peak in what its like to see the outdoors through his eyes. His humorous and matter-of-fact way of looking at things brings a fresh perspective to hunting and fishing.(n)

programme.title: Greg McHale's Wild Yukon
programme.desc: Greg treks and paddles a packraft deep into moose country for an incredible, late-season bowhunt.(n)

programme.title: Under Wild Skies *
programme.desc: Tony and Professional Hunter Jacques Hartzenburg of Chapungu-Kambako Safaris head to familiar hunting grounds, the Timbavati Game Reserve in South Africa, to hunt Cape buffalo in the thick stuff. Tony takes a couple of nice bulls.(n)

programme.title: Trijicon's World of Sports Afield
programme.sub-title: Feeding a Passion for Mule Deer
programme.desc: Tim Harold is in hot pursuit of mule deer. The rut is kicking in as Tim joins good friend Tom McReynolds in the great state of South Dakota. This area holds world-class mule deer, but the open country often makes closing the gap for a shot difficult.(n)

programme.title: The Fierce Life *
programme.sub-title: Send It... Fierce Long Range Shooting School
programme.desc: Experience the annual Fierce Long Range Shooting School.(n)

programme.title: RNT-V *
programme.desc: Jimbo, Blake, Jake and Charlee the duck dog head West to meet up with Ryan Livingston and Prairie Rock Outfitters for some epic Platte River waterfowling.(n)

programme.title: Avian-X TV
programme.desc: Fred hunts late season mallards, the old fashioned way on the big water of Lake Erie with longtime friends, Jimmy Wren and Jeff Shelby.(n)

programme.title: Bill Dance Saltwater
programme.desc: Bill Dance and Captain Josh Nelson fish the flat, shallow, emerald green waters of Crab Island by Destin, Fla. for some fighting redfish.(n)

programme.title: Sweetwater
programme.desc: School is in session as Miles and Joey bring their better halves on a double date on the waters of Logan Martin Lake and pull in tons of bass.(n)

programme.title: Respect the Game TV *
programme.desc: Paul and Ty Biggs have struggles and success in their home state of Oklahoma. Whitetail is in their blood.(n)

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures
programme.sub-title: The Outfit: Rogue River Outfitters - Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. Team Shockey celebrates 25 years of outfitting.(n)

programme.title: Out-There TV
programme.desc: Corey Brossman hunts the Midwest for giant whitetails during the opening week of the Illinois archery season. His young daughter flies into camp for a youth hunt filled with excitement.(n)

programme.title: Hornady's Dark & Dangerous *
programme.sub-title: Safari in the Land of Legends
programme.desc: Experience the intense tracking of a wounded cape buffalo in the thick bush of the Zambezi Valley with PH Len Taylor. Also, we begin a safari with veteran PH and elephant expert Buzz Charlton for a legendary valley tusker.(n)

programme.title: Backcountry Hunters TV
programme.desc: Hal Gahm and Todd McKinney team up with Joey Burns to hunt mule deer on one of the most unbelievable places in Colorado.(n)

programme.title: Handguns And Defensive Weapons
programme.desc: Rich, Jim and Scott discuss handgun recoil and how it affects shooters, with tips on gear selection and shooting techniques. Rich and Scott discuss the merits of different targets, and Jim shows how to set up a simple drill with paper plates.(n)

programme.title: Gallery of Guns
programme.desc: The Taurus TH9 compact and full-size in 9mm will be on display along with a precision rifle from Ruger and DiamondBack will show us an AR in 6.5 Grendel. We also have a Davidson's exclusive Ruger LCP Custom and a suppresser ready .22LR from Browning.(n)

programme.title: All Things Hunting - ATH *
programme.desc: Kyle and Cole spend a season in Oklahoma chasing a buck that seems to have no bounds on his home range. The buck named Sticker-Buck is both elusive and visible through most of the season before a full rut encounter gives them a shot.(n)

programme.title: Red Rising
programme.desc: Eric Hale is in Virginia hunting after bucks named Lefty and Johnny Appleseed. Both of these bucks give Eric a run for his money.(n)

programme.title: Big Deer TV
programme.desc: From base camp on the Oklahoma-Texas border, Mike & friends hunt rutting bucks in varied terrains.(n)

programme.title: Bowhunter TV
programme.desc: Bowhunters Brian Fortenbaugh and Jeff Waring hunt beefy whitetails in the foothills of Wyoming's Bighorn Mountains. Mike Carney shares his foodplotting insights.(n)

programme.title: Whitetail Fix *
programme.desc: Jose is on a mission in Michigan this year as he shows no mercy or slowing down.(n)

programme.title: Easton Bowhunting TV *
programme.desc: We use different tactics, including waterholes and horses, to get in bow range of pronghorn antelope.(n)

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures *
programme.desc: Eva and her husband Tim trek into the northern woodlands of Canada north with hunting buddy Wojo to go after whitetail deer. Tim packs his Bowtech and the buck comes in way closer than anyone expected.(n)

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures *
programme.sub-title: Will Power Will Overcome Any Obstacle: The Yukon
programme.desc: Jim guides the auction winner of a Yukon combination hunt he donates yearly to SCI.(n)

programme.title: Huntin' the Backwoods
programme.desc: Dan and Troy return to Newfoundland Adventures for another spring bear hunt with Todd and Laura Wiseman. Troy is shocked as he encounters not one, but two three-legged bears on the island and Dan tags another dandy Newfoundland bear.(n)

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures
programme.sub-title: The Outfit: Rogue River Outfitters - Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. Team Shockey celebrates 25 years of outfitting.(n)
